data.text:
Great hotel right on beach staff so friendly and helpful 
Food was amazing 10/10 for the chefs
Bar staff at the pool just great 
Would highly recommend this hotel 
Price reasonable 
Better to upgrade to all inclusive as drinks quite expensive,but that‚Äôs Dubia take plenty of money üòÅ
data.title: Holiday

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Caroline,
Thank you for your recent stay with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are delighted to hear that your experience with us was extremely good and that we were able to meet your expectations. Providing exceptional service and ensuring our guests have a memorable stay is our utmost priority, and we are thrilled to have succeeded in doing so during your visit. We truly appreciate your kind words and hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another great experience in the future.
Yours truly,
Zhazgul Zhanibekova 
Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Fassih  Sissaoui

data.text:
Stayed in the hotel for three nights and the hotel was very clean,the staff at the reception and all around the hotel were very helpful and very friendly.
The Breakfast was amazing the restaurant served really good food reasonable prices 
Thank to all the hotel staff.10/10
data.title: Very nice Hotel

data.text:
Hotel is located far from dubai center which might be a big minus for some it is also hard to get out of the palm on foot.

Hotel stuff was very helpful and breakfast were tasty and varied.

Unfortunately you could see that the glory days of this hotel are already behind it.

Apart from that i really enjoyed my stay here!
data.title: A bit far but still fine!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,
Thank you for choosing to stay at our hotel and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Your insights are invaluable as we strive to continuously improve the guest experience. We are pleased to hear that you found our staff to be helpful and enjoyed the tasty and varied breakfast options. Providing exceptional service and delicious dining experiences are top priorities for us, and we are delighted that we could meet your expectations in these areas. We also appreciate your feedback regarding the location of the hotel and the overall condition of the property. Rest assured, we are constantly working to maintain and improve our facilities to ensure that they meet the highest standards for our guests' comfort and satisfaction. We are thrilled that despite some shortcomings, you still enjoyed your stay with us. It was a pleasure to have you as our guest, and we hope to welcome you back for another memorable experience in the future.
Yours truly, 
Zhazgul Zhanibekova 
Assistant Front¬†Office¬†Manage
owner_response.author: Fassih  Sissaoui

data.text:
We stayed 4 amazing nights. I start from the day one, we arrived at the lobby which was not at a level of 5 start hotel but acceptable for a beach resort. Friendly receptionist who have given us all the necessary information.  

The room was very clean, partial view to both side of magnificent Dubai attractions, with a nice balcony to chill out.  Room facilities was awesome but honestly the bedding was not that comfortable as i have experience in other 5 star hotels. 

Bathroom is fantastic, however water intensity should be improved as well as hot water. 

The pool area and beach are marvelous in any terms, including facilities, chairs, towels and service. This hotel is from those rare resorts in the area where pool is close to the beach with fantastic view for photo-shooting. 

Breakfast variety were acceptable, but still have space to reach 5 star resort. The only odd thing was low cleaning service of the table, no coffee machine and with no offense but a black lady waitress who did not want to give the service which we do not know why as whatever we asked her she said ok but ignored! 

The big black guy at the entrance was soooo friendly and kind. He was welcoming guest in a very friendly way and guiding them with passion. 

All in all, i am afraid i did not stay longer!
data.title: Amazing place to chill and relax

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: Dear Guest, Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us following your stay at our hotel on the Palm. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the ambiance of our open atrium and found our basic room to be perfectly lovely. Providing a comfortable and pleasant stay for our guests is our priority, and we are pleased that we met your expectations in this regard. Your kind words about our amazing staff, particularly Gabriel, are truly appreciated, and we will ensure that your commendation is shared with the team. Additionally, we appreciate your constructive feedback regarding the rooftop bar. Rest assured; we will take your comments into consideration as we continue to enhance our facilities to better serve our guests. Once again, thank you for choosing to stay with us. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back for another enjoyable stay in the future. Yours truly, Zhazgul Zhanibekova Assistant Front Office Manager
owner_response.author: Fassih  Sissaoui

data.text:
Excellent hotel 
Very good value for the palm
Lovely and clean
Staff was amazing especially Gabriel
So helpful and pleasant.
Easy to get taxis to all attractions. 
Lovely boardwalk in front of hotel. 
Fabulous in every way
Will definitely be back. Had an amazing holiday.
data.title: Wonderful in every way
